description: Add a special touch to your grazing platter with a homemade roasted beetroot dip. This vibrant dip is easy to make and perfect with fresh veggie sticks.
name: Easy Beetroot Hummus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths cooked & peeled fresh beetroot, roughly chopped
1 small red capsicum, deseeded, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place chickpeas, beetroot and garlic in a food processor and process for 30 seconds or until smooth. Add tahini, oil, zest, juice and cumin, then process until well combined.
Spoon mixture into a medium bowl. Scatter with sesame seeds and drizzle with extra oil. Serve with cucumber, capsicum, radish, snow peas and carrots.
